sentences.en: CFTC study last year appeared to exonerate them.
sentences.cn: CFTC去年的一个研究报告赦免了他们。

sentences.en: A CFTC study last year appeared to exonerate them.
sentences.cn: CFTC去年的一个研究报告赦免了他们。

sentences.en: Presumably, the innocent participants knew such a tape would exonerate them.
sentences.cn: 据推测，清白的参赛者会知道这个录像带会证明他们没有作弊。
